text: History is definitely repeating itself. Reality TV star Audrina Patridge and musician Ryan Cabrera have officially called it quits — again. Back in 2010, the two dated for five months, which we saw unfold on The Hills. They rekindled their romance in 2018, but after once again dating for five months, they ’ ve decided to pull the plug. Here ’ s everything we know about why the couple split up for the second time. Audrina Patridge and Ryan Cabrera | John Shearer / Getty Images for Delphine Audrina Patridge and Ryan Cabrera | John Shearer / Getty Images for Delphine They ’ re better off as friends “ Ryan and I have been good friends for years, ” Patridge told E!
